ClassDesc: An opaque class for unbound values (used for script group inputs) Created by calling the @B_android#support#v8#renderscript#ScriptGroup#Builder2#addInput_E@ method. The value is assigned in @B_android#support#v8#renderscript#ScriptGroup#execute_E@ method as one of its arguments. Arguments to the execute method should be in the same order as intputs are added using the addInput method.
